1: -module(mafiapp_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    3: -export([init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, all/0, init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
    4: -export([add_service/1, friend_by_name/1, friend_with_services/1]).
    5: 
    6: 
    7: all() -> [add_service, friend_by_name, friend_with_services].
    8: 
    9: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   10: 	Priv = ?config(piv_dir, Config),
   11: 	application:set_env(mnesia, dir, Priv),
   12: 	mafiapp:install([node()]),
   13: 	application:start(mnesia),
   14: 	application:start(mafiapp),
   15: 	Config.
   16: 
   17: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   18: 	application:stop(mnesia),
   19: 	ok.
   20: 
   21: init_per_testcase(add_service, Config) ->
   22: 	Config;
   23: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   24: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Don Corleone", [], [boss], boss),
   25: 	Config.
   26: 
   27: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
   28: 	ok.
   29: 
   30: add_service(_Config) ->
   31: 	{error, unknown_friend} = mafiapp:add_service("from_name",
   32: 													"to_name",
   33: 													{1946,5,23},
   34: 													"a fake service"),
   35: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Don Corleone", [], [boss], boss),
   36: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Alan Parsons",
   37: 							[{twitter, "@ArtScienceSound"}],
   38: 							[{born, {1948,12,20}},
   39: 							musician, 'audio engineer',
   40: 							producer, 'has projects'], mixing),
   41: 	ok = mafiapp:add_service("Alan Parsons", "Don Corleone", {1973,3,1}, "Helped releasea Pink Floyd album").
   42: 
   43: friend_by_name(_Config) ->
   44: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Pete Cityshend",
   45: 								[{phone, "418-542-3000"},
   46: 								 {email, "test@example.com"},
   47: 								 {other, "yell real loud!"}],
   48: 								 [{born, {1945,5,19}}, musician, popular], music),
   49: 	{"Pete Cityshend", _Contact, _Info, music, _Services} = mafiapp:friend_by_name("Pete Cityshend"),
   50: 	undefined = mafiapp:friend_by_name(make_ref()).
   51: 
   52: friend_with_services(_Config) ->
   53: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Someone", [{other, "at the fruit stand"}],[weird,mysterious], shadiness),
   54: 	ok = mafiapp:add_service("Don Corleone", "someone", {1949,2,14}, "Increased business"),
   55: 	ok = mafiapp:add_service("Someone", "Don Corleone", {1949,12,25}, "Gave a Christmas gift"),
   56: 	%%we dont care about order
   57: 	{"Someone", _Contact, _Info, shadiness, [{to, "Don Corleone", {1949,12,25}, "Gave a Christmas gift"},
   58: 		{from, "Don Corleone", {1949,2,14}, "Increased business"}]} = mafiapp:friend_by_name("Someone").
